title: ‘A Massive Change’: How a Carbohydrate Revolution is Speeding up Pro Cycling
content:
Breakthroughs in nutrition science have enabled riders to eat more carbs than ever before: How far can the 'carbolution' go?

Read the full article at ‘A Massive Change’: How a Carbohydrate Revolution is Speeding up Pro Cycling on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
